ygData.subject: Re: My RL Wedding Dinner (EQ List @ 8/8/00)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sory for the late reply as well, im afraid i cant make it for the wedding dinner due to the fact tat my working hrs is not fixed like in shift work ( we have
ygData.messageBody:
Sory for the late reply as well, im afraid i cant make it for the wedding
dinner due to the fact tat my working hrs is not fixed like in shift work ( we
have to call back everynite for the next day in time)

So congratation in advance!! :)

P.S Another pervert has bite the dust as well *sigh* Guess tat left oni Zan, FF
and me around to disturb Fesse :)

Trifrost the old man

LKW wrote:

> The confirmed list:
>
> Bibi
> Gala
> Merns
> Leshrec
> Massiah
> Kellendil
>
> The rest either still cannot confired (Fes, Garren) or no reply (Tri, Zand,
> Febon). If still cannot confirm/reply by this week, I have to settle the
> seating arrangement liao (put 4 gamers into EQ table), sorry.
>
> Those listed kakis, if u have not received my invitation card by mid Aug,
> pls email me, thx!
>
> On Friday, 21 July, 2000 10:31 AM, LKW [SMTP:leekw13@...] wrote:
> > Pls reply with ya contact number as well, thx! ;)
> >
> > On Friday, 21 July, 2000 10:26 AM, LKW [SMTP:leekw13@...]
> wrote:
> > > Ooi guys,
> > >
> > > Long time no see ah.
> > >
> > > I would like to take this opportunity to invite you guys to my RL
> wedding
> > > dinner ;)
> > >
> > > It has been a year since I played EQ but so far I have never meet
> anyone of
> > > you. Unlike my UO kakis, whom we have meet many times having supper at
> > > Geylang when server down at 2-3am, dinner at newton circle, movie at
> > > leisure gallery etc, our EQ gang seem more "shy" and "quiet", hehe.
> > >
> > > The time round I hope to take this opportunity to invite you guys to
> attend
> > > my wedding dinner and at the same time gather and meet. I got 1 table
> > > reserved for you guys, another table for my UO kakis. I believe you
> guys
> > > may know some of them who are also playing other online games.
> > >
> > > The date is 6th Sep 2000 (Wed, sorry for a weekday but it's a
> "selected"
> > > date by parents, bo bian), venue is Orchard Parade Hotel Ballroom. The
> > > banquet dishes will be prepared by Club Chinois, so we will have good
> food,
> > > food drinks but sorry, no good women provided ;P Of coz most impt is
> to
> > > gather and talk cock sing songs lah!
> > >
> > > Anyway we gotta settle the table guest list within this month (tolong
> me
> > > la, I've been bothered by this wedding, house renovation, photo taking
> > > matters for 3-4 months liao, let me have some early preparation and
> take a
> > > month rest before my BIG day, ok? Heh), appreciate if you guy can let
> me
> > > know if you are attending ASAP (by 31/7/00). If you are coming (really
> > > hope so), pls include your full RL name, EQ char name (in case you
> change
> > > char and I dunno ya new char), as well as your mailing address in your
> > > e-mail reply.
> > >
> > > I only invite close, local players, but if I missed out any, pls let me
> > > know.
> > >
> > > Thanks a million!
> > >
> > > Yours truly,
> > > Kar Wai, aka Dark Flame
> > >
> > > P/S: Due to the limited seats, I'm unable to invite those newer
> Singapore
> > > EQ members/allies. Only "KAKIS" got the privilege, hehe. So if I
> received
> > > no reply by 31/7/00 (gotta give me sometime to print invitation cards
> also,
> > > right?), I have to treat it as you DON'T GIVE FACE (and dun even bother
> to
> > > reply!?) and will ask Fesse to sleep with you then!!! ;P
> > >
> > >
